NC.Q: Between the flows from node Orchards to node Dairies and from node Fisheries to node Beverage Plants, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Food Banks to node Farmers' Markets, from node Orchards to node Beverage Plants, and from node Farmers' Markets to node Orchards, which path has the largest flow?
